summary: This document is an email communication from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, dated January 7, 2010. The email emphasizes the confidentiality of its contents and suggests that it may contain privileged information. The communication is marked as confidential and warns against unauthorized use or disclosure.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating the communication is confidential and may be privileged.

It warns against unauthorized use, disclosure, or copying of the email.
